meanings.definition: The act of translating something again.
meanings.sent1: The retranslation of the ancient text helped clarify its meaning.
meanings.sent2: The retranslation of the document was necessary to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The retranslation of the recipe made it sound like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: Her retranslation of the poem breathed new life into the words.
meanings.sent5: The retranslation of the song lyrics made them easier to understand.

meanings.definition: A new translation of a previously translated text.
meanings.sent1: The retranslation of the novel captured the nuances of the original language.
meanings.sent2: The retranslation of the play brought out hidden meanings in the dialogue.
meanings.sent3: The retranslation of the menu made it seem like a completely different cuisine.
meanings.sent4: His retranslation of the speech resonated with the audience in a new way.
meanings.sent5: The retranslation of the article revealed errors in the previous version.
